definitions.text: (baseball) the slight elevation on which the pitcher stands
a collection of objects laid on top of each other
structure consisting of an artificial heap or bank usually of earth or stones
examples: they built small mounds to hide behind

definitions.text: the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
examples: he has played every position except pitcher
they have a southpaw on the mound
